scripts.build-niivue: cd src/UI/src/niivue && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-ui: cd src/UI && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build-niivue && npm run build-ui && electron src/main.js
scripts.dev: export NIIVUE_DEV_LAUNCH_DELAY=2000; npm run build-niivue && concurrently --kill-others "electron src/main.js" "cd src/UI && npm run dev"
scripts.package: npm run build-niivue && npm run build-ui && electron-forge package
scripts.make: npm run build-niivue && npm run build-ui && electron-forge make
scripts.postinstall: npm run build-niivue && npm run build-ui
